short_summary: Maintenance and renovation services for the Crown-owned portfolio. Optional teleconference.
description: Maintenance and renovation services for the Crown-owned portfolio. The Crown-owned portfolio consists of properties owned by the Department of National Defence (DND) and managed by the Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA).
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Solicitation Number:** WS4256075620
**Tender Title (English):** Responsive Maintenance Services - Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA) - Shilo
**Tender Title (French):** Services de maintenance réactifs - Agence du logement des Forces canadiennes (ALFC) - Shilo

**Key Dates:**
* **Publication Date:** 2023-11-01
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-12-19T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-12-13

**Related UNSPSC Codes:**
* 30161700 - Flooring
* 47000000 - Cleaning Equipment and Supplies
* 72151301 - Residential painting service
* 72152300 - Carpentry services
* 72152600 - Roofing service
* 72152601 - Roofing and siding and sheet metal services

* 76101602 - Asbestos removal or encapsulation
* 76110000 - Cleaning and janitorial services
* 76121900 - Hazardous waste disposal
* 80161601 - Property management services
* 82151501 - Painters services

**Trade Agreements:**
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Notice and Contact Information:**
